Direct Known Subclasses:
OrderedEventManager
public abstract class EventManager
extends BlockManager

This is a queue that accepts objects manages a collection of event handlers. A user will create and instance of the EventHandler and pass it into this event collector. Subclasses include an Ordered and Parallel version. Creation date: (2000-02-24 17:01:26)

Method Detail

put

public void put(java.lang.Object o)
